title: Wrapped in support: Richards teachers mark World Hijab Day
text: Wrapped in support: Richards teachers mark World Hijab Day To be Muslim Gary Middendorf / Daily Southtown Rahaf Othman, left, a social studies teacher at Richards High School, talks about what it's like to be a Muslim woman in America.
